title: Dragons Realm
description: Discover the "Masterful Storytelling" of Tessa Dawn in the breathtaking, original series that has been hailed as riveting, original, and deftly crafted ( Midwest Book Review ). Mina Louvet is a fighter, a human with a powerful will to survive in a world dominated by warlocks, soul-eaters, and shifters. She is also a lowly slave who has been identified by the king's witch as one of the rare, invaluable females who can give birth to a dragon's son. Dante Dragona is a lethal dragon prince, destined to succeed his merciless father to the throne of Castle Dragon, but first, he must breed an heir with a slave. Raised to be as ruthless as he is powerful, he has no room in his life for disobedience...or love. When the iron resolve of a dragon prince clashes with the stubborn will of a slave, bonds will be broken, alliances will be tested, and a kingdom will be set ablaze.DRAGONS REALM SAGA  (is) "an intense read of betrayal,deception, cruelty, greed, power and romance" that rose to the top of eight bestselling charts.
author: Tessa Dawn
